price: 49. Degenen die hun Heer vrezen zonder Hem te zien, terwijl zij angst hebben voor het Uur.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wahum mina al-sāʿati mush'fiqūna
